name: agnosticui
author: Rob Levin
description: An agnostic UI component library prioritizing clean HTML and CSS, but built to agnostically work with many popular JavaScript frameworks like React, Vue, and Svelte.

scripts.test:all: cd ./agnosticui-react && yarn syncStyles && yarn test && cd ../agnosticui-svelte && yarn syncStyles && yarn test && cd ../agnosticui-vue && yarn syncStyles && yarn test && cd ..
